articles.title: New York man indicted on multiple hate crime charges in attacks on 7 Asian women - CNN
articles.description: A man who allegedly assaulted seven Asian women over about a three hour period in New York City in late February has been indicted on multiple hate crime charges, the Manhattan District Attorney's Office announced Monday.
